data.text: Are Shimano Center Lock Hub and Sram Center Lock Rotor Compatible?

Have a new set of wheels on the way. They have center lock hubs on them. I ordered a set of sram center lock rotors to go with them. I guess I should have asked before I bought them but are sram and shimano center lock designs the same? I wasn’t sure if there is a difference between the 2 and if the wheels may have one or the other design on them.
Yep. I have those on my gravel bike… they handle heat well. I’d say they are better performing than last gen Ultegra and DuraAce.
data.author: Matt Simmøns

data.text: Yep, centerlock is centerlock. Only thing to watch out for is some centerlock nuts are deeper than others. There is a chart out there somewhere that shows the difference. Probably a non issue, but some frames/forks have tight clearances.
data.author: Jonathan Thornburg

data.text: The only thing different is the lock ring depending on axle size...usually not a problem for gravel bikes.
data.author: Josh Kebschull

data.text: Buy a set of center lock to 6 bolt adapters and stick with 6 bolt rotors.
data.author: Mark Studnicki

data.text: just curious - what is the rationale?
data.author: Filip Rabuzin

data.text: I did not like using adapters… they introduce a little play in brakes where the bike can rock front to back even with the brakes fully squeezed. Just my opinion.
data.author: Jonathan Thornburg

data.text: only replace the part that wears out. Not the entire center lock mounting part which makes those rotors more expensive.
data.author: Mark Studnicki

data.text: mine do the same thing. Just got in the habit of not doing that.
data.author: Mark Studnicki

data.text: that’s fair, just didn’t like that feeling myself.
data.author: Jonathan Thornburg

data.text: Yep, one of the few things that are standardized between companies.
data.author: John Beaumont

data.text: Amazing. How did they let that happen?
data.author: Mark Rosenberg

data.text: Just had a Sram put on. The weight between this and shimano from someone who doesnt pay attention was nuts
